text: But I say to you that whoever divorces his wife, except for a case of fornication,Presumably a reference to premarital sex, where a groom discovers that his bride is no longer a virgin (like the situation that Joseph faced in 1:18-19). See Matthew 19:3-12. causes her to commit adultery,In that culture such a woman would look for another man as a matter of physical survival. and whoever marries a divorced woman commits adultery.
